Open Test Map for Feedback

Doom II mod | Released 2016 



summary
articles
reviews
files
videos
images







This may be pretty short for a DOOM level but it's just a test for feedback by casual players to exert map-makers.

TestMap

Jun 8 2016 

				Demo 2 comments 
Just a basic map for testing. When you are done testing you are welcome to comment what you thought was good and what was bad about the map and I will...

Comments












Kizoky Jun 8 2016 

Just by looking at the images I can tell that open areas without any detail looks ugly :)



Reply Good karma Bad karma+1 vote 










omegamer Jun 8 2016 

i didnt play your map yet, but one tip, if you want more feedback on your map,
post it in a thread on the doomworld.com forums, moddb really isnt the best choice for doom mods\wads. Just a tip, have a nice day man :)



Reply Good karma Bad karma+1 vote 







Creator 


SirLaggsalot Jun 9 2016 

Thanks for the tip. I'll try posting on DoomWorld and see what happens.



Reply Good karma+1 vote
